attributes.action: No confidence in this present government
attributes.additional_details: In view of the many many ill thought out Bills placed before parliament by this present coalition government and bills not fit for purpose due to them being rushed and having to be revisited because of insufficient work being carried out prior to their enactment, I propose that this government is not capable of delivering a fully considered governance of this Country and I wish to propose a vote of no confidence

rejection.details: Votes of no confidence are amatter for Parliament not the Government.
